Values.METERINGPOINT_QUEUE_NAME: <Name of Service Bus queue for receiving business requests and internal commands>
Values.METERINGPOINT_QUEUE_SEND_CONNECTION_STRI: <Service Bus connection string with send permissions where business requests and internal commands are received>
Values.METERINGPOINT_QUEUE_MANAGE_CONNECTION_ST: <Service Bus connection string where business requests and internal commands are received with manage permissions>
Values.SHARED_SERVICE_BUS_MANAGE_CONNECTION_STR: <Service Bus connection string with manage permissions for shared service bus>
Values.REQUEST_BUNDLE_QUEUE_SUBSCRIBER_QUEUE: <Queue for post office to request bundle>
Values.BUNDLE_DEQUEUED_SUBSCRIBER_QUEUE: <Queue for post office to inform on dequeue>
